dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here is a summary of your activities and upcoming appointments.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Appointment
schedule.step1_desc_new: Choose an existing client or add a new one.
schedule.step2_desc: Select one or more services for this appointment.
schedule.step3_desc: Choose the date and time for the appointment.
schedule.step4_desc: Select the payment status for this appointment.
schedule.summary_desc: Review the details below before confirming the appointment.
schedule.paid_desc: Payment has been received in full.
schedule.success_toast_desc: Appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been successfully booked.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View and manage your client roster.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for the new customer below.
add.success_toast_desc: The customer has been successfully added to your roster.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: List of all tarot reading services you offer.

general_reading.title: General Reading
general_reading.description: A broad overview of your current energies. Perfect for clients without a specific question.

love_relationship.title: Love & Relationship Reading
love_relationship.description: Romantic relationships (partner, ex, potential). Love energy, loyalty, relationship future. Suitable for those in new relationships, LDRs, or conflicts.

career_business.title: Career & Business Reading
career_business.description: Career direction, job choices, business opportunities. Suitable for those contemplating resignation, interviews, or promotions.

finance.title: Finance Reading
finance.description: Financial energy, opportunities for prosperity, expenses, investments. Can be combined with actionable advice.

spiritual_healing.title: Spiritual & Healing Reading
spiritual_healing.description: Aura, karma, past life, and inner energy readings. Suitable for those needing self-reflection or emotional healing.

yes_no.title: "Yes or No" Reading
yes_no.description: A direct answer to one specific question. Quick and simple, suitable for express services.

time_based.title: Time-based Reading
time_based.description: Weekly, monthly, or yearly energy forecast. Predictions for a specific period.

past_present_future.title: Past-Present-Future Reading
past_present_future.description: Highlights the past, current situation, and future predictions.

soulmate_twin_flame.title: Soulmate / Twin Flame Reading
soulmate_twin_flame.description: Soul connections, spiritual relationships, destined partners.

chakra_energy.title: Chakra or Energy Reading
chakra_energy.description: Assesses the balance of the body's energy or chakras.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Pricing guide for tarot reading services in Indonesia.
pricing.table_description: The prices below are general estimates and may vary.

factors.complexity: The complexity of the question or reading.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: Manage your public profile and professional details.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application and service settings.

specializations.title: Service Specializations
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you offer.

durations.title: Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Set the duration and price for each service.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Enable or disable payment methods for your clients.

reading.title: New AI Reading
reading.description: Start a new tarot reading session for a client.
reading.spreadDescription: The classic spread for Past, Present, and Future.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: Could not get an interpretation. Please try again.

loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... Please wait.

landing.heroTitle: Unlock the Secrets of Your Path
landing.heroSubtitle: Receive insightful, personalized tarot readings to navigate life's questions with clarity and confidence.
landing.aboutText: With over 15 years of experience, Madame Elena offers compassionate and insightful readings to help you find clarity and purpose. Her intuitive guidance empowers you to navigate life's journey with confidence.
landing.servicesSubtitle: Explore our range of specialized readings tailored to your needs.
landing.testimonialsSubtitle: Discover how our readings have provided clarity and guidance.
